reviewText: Amazon listing erroneously stated the great Geraldine Page is in this film.  She is not.  Geraldine Fitzgerald is.

I liked the two television programs as they are deeply spiritual and the teachings given in them are biblical and represented in a reverent manner. I was appalled about the difference between what was presented to the public on T.V. back then and the filth that is being presented to the public now. Wonderful programs.
